member.name: T:Text_Speaker.Speak
member.summary: This is a windows form designed to provide a simple gui layer to .net speech sysnthesis
member.remarks: This is the first C# program I have ever written This is also not meant to give a complete wrapper to the module

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.voiceMenu
member.summary: This puts all the installed voices into the Voices Menu in the Options Drop Down
member.remarks: Not all installed voices on the system will be usable by speech synthesiser

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.button1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.param: This is information about what sent the event

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.synth_SpeakProgress(System.Object,System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: This is used to tell how far the speech has gone

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.synth_SpeakCompleted(System.Object,System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: This occcurs when the speech is finally completed

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.infoToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This gives a simple pop up to give information about the program

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.selectGender_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This selects the gender for the select voice by hints

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.selectAge_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This sets the age for the select voice by hints

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.changeVoice_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This changes the voice of synthesiser

member.name: M:Text_Speaker.Speak.helpToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This opens up a webpage to help page

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.
